function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of reliable and constant ICT connection","Impact":"Disruption of stable ICT service","Mitigation":"Implementation of multiple reliable ICT connections","Technologies":"Optical fiber cable, metal cable, cellular telephone network, personal handy phone network","People":"Residents, workers","Owner":"ICT service providers, residents, employers"},{"Description":"Inflexible indoor space during quarantine","Impact":"Difficulty in transforming rooms to meet occupants' needs","Mitigation":"Use of adjustable space and home adjustability technologies","Technologies":"Home adjustability technologies","People":"Residents, workers","Owner":"Designers, architects, residents"},{"Description":"Inadequate personal space for family members","Impact":"Difficulty in establishing boundaries of private space","Mitigation":"Provision of sufficient private space for work, study, and personal reasons","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Families, individuals","Owner":"Developers, architects"}]}
